alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 18 at 9:25PM PST until November 21 at 2:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest potential for damaging winds will be below the Cajon Pass Monday and Monday evening, and below the San Gorgonio Pass Monday night into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
